titleStmt.title: Articles of visitation and enquiry concerning matters ecclesiastical, exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens, and side-men of every parish within the Diocess of VVorchester, in the episcopal visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God VValter by divine permission Lord Bishop of Worcester.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Worcester. Bishop (1671-1675 : Blandford)
Blandford, Walter, 1619-1675.
